description: Styles for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, defining layout, colors, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container styling for the application, centering content and providing overall layout.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styling for the game title, including color and font size.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board, arranging squares in a 3x3 format.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styling for individual squares on the game board, defining appearance and interaction.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styling for displaying the current game status.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styling for the controls section, managing layout and spacing.

classes.name: button
classes.description: Base styling for buttons used in the application.

classes.name: button-primary
classes.description: Styling for the primary button variant, adjusting background color and text color.

classes.name: button-secondary
classes.description: Styling for the secondary button variant.

classes.name: button-accent
classes.description: Styling for the accent button variant.
